name: part_008
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei Live Tour 2024 ＂Spectra of Nova＂【おおきにアリーナ舞洲】 [Q1s4w-_ujig]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Interlude with crowd cheering and light transition.

subtitles.original: …咲き誇れ
subtitles.english: ...bloom proudly

subtitles.original: 踏み出す先は未開の時代
subtitles.english: The path ahead is an unexplored era

subtitles.original: 立ち止まってる時間はないの
subtitles.english: There's no time to stand still

subtitles.original: 一陣の風を巻き起こせ
subtitles.english: Stir up a sudden gust of wind

subtitles.original: 壁を作るな 足を止めるな
subtitles.english: Don't build walls, don't stop moving

subtitles.original: 無情な嵐 さす傘はなし
subtitles.english: A heartless storm, no umbrella to hold

subtitles.original: 永遠など望みはしないの
subtitles.english: I don't wish for things like eternity

subtitles.original: 今を満たしたいわ
subtitles.english: I want to fill the 'now'

subtitles.original: さあ 化せ 化せ よさぁ 化せ 切り抜くまで
subtitles.english: Now, transform, transform, come on, transform until the end

subtitles.original: 澄み切り闇は無限の木立
subtitles.english: The clear darkness is a grove of infinity

subtitles.original: また砕け散るこの身じゃないの
subtitles.english: This body won't just crumble and scatter again

subtitles.original: またたく火の地を咲き誇れ
subtitles.english: Let the blood of the flickering fire bloom proudly

subtitles.original: 最高峰へ
subtitles.english: To the highest peak

subtitles.original: 白いカーテンの末 似たような朝のようで
subtitles.english: Beyond the white curtains, it seems like just another morning

subtitles.original: まるで違う 交差するSighs 新しく目覚めるBedmaster
subtitles.english: Entirely different, intersecting sighs, a newly awakened Bedmaster

subtitles.original: Tick-tock another story テンポは居合わず 私アドメ
subtitles.english: Tick-tock another story, the tempo doesn't match, I adome

subtitles.original: I don't care about the story 何を信じる？
subtitles.english: I don't care about the story, what do you believe in?

subtitles.original: 眩しくてそらした初期衝動 今 追随して
subtitles.english: Dazzled, I turned away from that initial impulse, now I'm following it

subtitles.original: 空の愛の歌描いて 聞き飽きてきたでしょ
subtitles.english: Drawing empty love songs, you're getting tired of hearing them, right?

subtitles.original: 流行性の反存在 退屈してんじゃない？
subtitles.english: A trendy anti-existence, aren't you bored?

subtitles.original: I'm ready to dance!
subtitles.english: I'm ready to dance!

subtitles.original: 千載一遇のニュアンスで 有象無象 後続のシンパシーで
subtitles.english: With a once-in-a-lifetime nuance, the masses, with subsequent sympathy

subtitles.original: 直感主義のイノセンスで 有象無象 奇跡も世界も自分次第で
subtitles.english: With intuitive innocence, the masses, miracles and the world are all up to you

subtitles.original: 最上級の革命の狼煙は 覚悟 変化を恐れない覚悟
subtitles.english: The signal fire for the ultimate revolution is resolve, the resolve not to fear change

subtitles.original: 乾いて 大地を駆けろ 唯一の光
subtitles.english: Thirsting, run across the earth, the one and only light

subtitles.original: 変えたい 変えたい 平穏さが魂を焚きつける
subtitles.english: I want to change, I want to change, the tranquility stokes my soul

subtitles.original: 独占 マンネリ 一刀両断 サプライズで ドラマチックなヒストリーにしよう
subtitles.english: Monopoly, mannerism, cutting in two, with a surprise, let's make it a dramatic history

subtitles.original: アンカー 夜空に架けた 遠すぎる欠片
subtitles.english: Anchor, cast into the night sky, fragments too far away

subtitles.original: 光速超え見せられるまで醒めない
subtitles.english: Surpassing the speed of light, I won't wake until I'm shown

subtitles.original: 惑星が導き出されて What do you need? What do you take? 存在の場所は
subtitles.english: The planets are led out, what do you need? What do you take? The place of existence is

subtitles.original: 不穏な夢なら青天井 無限歩高でハイテンション 突き抜ける銀河の果てで 一呼吸
subtitles.english: If it's an unsettling dream, the sky's the limit, high tension at infinite walking height, taking a breath at the edge of the galaxy

subtitles.original: モニター越しの輝きじゃ つまんない
subtitles.english: Glittering through a monitor is boring

subtitles.original: 飛び出す 創造なら Go to heaven 目をそらさず見ててね 終焉の黎明
subtitles.english: Leaping out, if it's creation, go to heaven, watch without turning away, the dawn of the end

subtitles.original: 踏み出した刹那の色を作る アップデート 希望も絶望も自分次第で
subtitles.english: Creating the color of the moment I stepped out, update, hope and despair are both up to you

subtitles.original: 最上級の革命の火蓋は 覚悟 変化を恐れず
subtitles.english: The start of the ultimate revolution is resolve, without fearing change
